subject: Investing
title: Property Insurance Must-Knows
description: A quick, practical guide to Property Insurance Must-Knows.

hook.text: A burst pipe caused $40,000 in damage. The landlord's basic policy covered only $15,000.

buildup.text: Landlord policies differ from homeowner policies; they cover the structure and liability, not contents.

discovery.text: Umbrella policies add $1M or more of liability coverage for roughly $200â€“$400 per year.

twist.text: Flood and earthquake damage are excluded from standard policies and need separate riders.

climax.text: Review coverage annually. As property values rise, being underinsured becomes the silent risk.

punchline.text: Insurance is boring until the day it saves your entire investment.
